verses.verse: (For the choir director; upon Aijeleth Hashshahar. A Psalm of David.) My God, <S%H410><s%> my God, <S%H410><s%> why <S%H4100><s%> hast Thou forsaken <S%H5800><s%> me? Far <S%H7350><s%> from my deliverance <S%H3444><s%> are the words <S%H1697><s%> of my groaning. <S%H7581><s%>
O my God, <S%H430><s%> I cry <S%H7121><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> but Thou dost not answer; <S%H6030><s%> And by night, <S%H3915><s%> but I have no <S%H3808><s%> rest. <S%H1747><s%>
Yet Thou art holy, <S%H6918><s%> O Thou who art enthroned <S%H3427><s%> upon the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
In Thee our fathers trusted; <S%H1><s%> They trusted, <S%H982><s%> and Thou didst deliver <S%H982><s%> them.
To Thee they cried <S%H2199><s%> out, and were delivered; <S%H4422><s%> In Thee they trusted, <S%H982><s%> and were not disappointed. <S%H954><s%>
But I am a worm, <S%H9641><s%> and not a man, <S%H376><s%> A reproach <S%H2781><s%> of men, <S%H120><s%> and despised <S%H959><s%> by the people. <S%H5971><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> who see <S%H7200><s%> me sneer <S%H3932><s%> at me; They separate <S%H6362><s%> with the lip, <S%H8193><s%> they wag <S%H5128><s%> the head, <S%H7218><s%> [saying,]
"Commit <S%H1556><s%> [yourself] to the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> let Him deliver <S%H6403><s%> him; Let Him rescue <S%H5337><s%> him, because <S%H3588><s%> He delights <S%H2654><s%> in him."
Yet <S%H3588><s%> Thou art He who didst bring <S%H1518><s%> me forth <S%H1518><s%> from the womb; <S%H990><s%> Thou didst make me trust <S%H982><s%> [when] upon my mother's breasts. <S%H7699><s%>
Upon Thee I was cast <S%H7993><s%> from birth; <S%H7358><s%> Thou hast been my God <S%H410><s%> from my mother's womb. <S%H990><s%>
Be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me, for trouble <S%H6869><s%> is near; <S%H7138><s%> For there <S%H369><s%> is none <S%H369><s%> to help. <S%H5826><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> bulls <S%H6499><s%> have surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me; Strong <S%H47><s%> [bulls] of Bashan <S%H1316><s%> have encircled <S%H3803><s%> me.
They open <S%H6475><s%> wide <S%H6475><s%> their mouth <S%H6310><s%> at me, As a ravening <S%H2963><s%> and a roaring <S%H7580><s%> lion. <S%H9030><s%>

I am poured <S%H8210><s%> out like water, <S%H4325><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> my bones <S%H6106><s%> are out of joint; <S%H6504><s%> My heart <S%H3820><s%> is like wax; <S%H1749><s%> It is melted <S%H4549><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> me.

My strength <S%H3581><s%> is dried <S%H3001><s%> up like a potsherd, <S%H2789><s%> And my tongue <S%H3956><s%> cleaves <S%H1692><s%> to my jaws; <S%H9270><s%> And Thou dost lay <S%H8239><s%> me in the dust <S%H6083><s%> of death. <S%H4194><s%>

For dogs <S%H3611><s%> have surrounded <S%H5437><s%> me; A band <S%H5712><s%> of evildoers <S%H7489><s%> has encompassed <S%H5362><s%> me; They pierced <S%H9206><s%> my hands <S%H3027><s%> and my feet. <S%H7272><s%>
I can count <S%H5608><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my bones. <S%H6106><s%> They look, <S%H5027><s%> they stare <S%H7200><s%> at me;
They divide <S%H2505><s%> my garments <S%H899><s%> among them, And for my clothing <S%H3830><s%> they cast <S%H5307><s%> lots. <S%H1486><s%>
But Thou, O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> be not far <S%H7368><s%> off; O Thou my help, <S%H360><s%> hasten <S%H2363><s%> to my assistance. <S%H5833><s%>
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the sword, <S%H2719><s%> My only <S%H3173><s%> [life] from the power <S%H3027><s%> of the dog. <S%H3611><s%>
Save <S%H3467><s%> me from the lion's mouth; <S%H6310><s%> And from the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the wild <S%H7214><s%> oxen <S%H7214><s%> Thou dost answer <S%H6030><s%> me.
I will tell <S%H5608><s%> of Thy name <S%H8034><s%> to my brethren; <S%H251><s%> In the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the assembly <S%H6951><s%> I will praise <S%H1984><s%> Thee.

You who fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> praise <S%H1984><s%> Him; All <S%H3605><s%> you descendants <S%H2233><s%> of Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> glorify <S%H3513><s%> Him, And stand <S%H9076><s%> in awe <S%H9076><s%> of Him, all <S%H3605><s%> you descendants <S%H2233><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For He has not despised <S%H959><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> abhorred <S%H8262><s%> the affliction <S%H6039><s%> of the afflicted; <S%H6041><s%> Neither <S%H3808><s%> has He hidden <S%H5641><s%> His face <S%H6440><s%> from him; But when he cried <S%H7768><s%> to Him for help, <S%H7768><s%> He heard. <S%H8085><s%>
From Thee [comes] my praise <S%H8416><s%> in the great <S%H7227><s%> assembly; <S%H6951><s%> I shall pay <S%H9608><s%> my vows <S%H5088><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him.

The afflicted <S%H6035><s%> shall eat <S%H398><s%> and be satisfied; <S%H7646><s%> Those who seek <S%H1875><s%> Him will praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%> Let your heart <S%H3824><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> forever! <S%H5703><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the ends <S%H657><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will remember <S%H2142><s%> and turn <S%H7725><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> will worship <S%H7812><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee.
For the kingdom <S%H4410><s%> is the Lord's, And He rules <S%H4910><s%> over the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the prosperous <S%H1879><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will eat <S%H398><s%> and worship, <S%H7812><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> those who go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the dust <S%H6083><s%> will bow <S%H3766><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Him, Even he who cannot <S%H3808><s%> keep <S%H2421><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>
Posterity <S%H2233><s%> will serve <S%H5647><s%> Him; It will be told <S%H5608><s%> of the Lord <S%H136><s%> to the [coming] generation. <S%H1755><s%>
They will come <S%H935><s%> and will declare <S%H5046><s%> His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> To a people <S%H5971><s%> who will be born, <S%H3205><s%> that He has performed <S%H6213><s%> [it.]
